sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.RestStepFormUrlEncodedUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Util to create form url encoded payload.</description>
        <name>RestStepFormUrlEncodedUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var RestStepFormUrlEncodedUtil = Class.create();
RestStepFormUrlEncodedUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
        this.parts = [];
    },
    addNameValue: function(name, value) {
        this.parts.push({
            name: name,
            value: value,
            order: this.parts.length
        });
    },
	
    build: function() {
        return JSON.stringify(this.parts);
    },
    type: 'RestStepFormUrlEncodedUtil'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-07-14 07:35:24</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>7d40f433eba41110840129a77c5228e6</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>RestStepFormUrlEncodedUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="ServiceNow IntegrationHub Action Step - REST" source="com.glide.hub.action_step.rest">c73b7ca03c35311068bcf327dfe37f9e</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7d40f433eba41110840129a77c5228e6</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-07-14 07:35:24</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
